main.bio: I am a passionate intermediate software developer with 3 years of experience and an extensive knowledge in applying engineering principles to develop high-performance ML data models and web-based applications. I have a keen interest in Frontend Development, Machine Learning and Cloud Computing. I hold several certificates inanalytics, software development, and cloud computing. At my leisure I study Computer Vision (OpenCV and PyTorch) and Data Analytics, Iâ€™m a proponent of Deep Learning, Machine Learning and Agile Development.

work.title: Software Developer

work.title: Network Engineer @ Nampak
work.description: Providing Network Support to Multi-National Corporations. Resolve any network-related malfunctions. Proactively monitor network environment for errors/problems. Configure and Install network nodes such as switches, routers, access points, and wireless controllers. Pen-tests and making sure the network is secure.

testimonials.text: Anele Michael Mbabela is one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
